definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
to put down in writing/to take down notes/transcript/record
the wording and purport of what one writes
foreshadowing (literary device)/foretaste of material to come (in essay or story)
perfectly straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright

sentences.english: Can you use lipstick on your eyes?
sentences.chinese: 把脣線筆當作眼線筆使用或者反一反？

sentences.english: He refused to accept the money.
The man abstracted a pen from my pocket.
sentences.chinese: 那人從我口袋裏偷去了一支筆。

sentences.english: Don’t torment yourself if a trade continues winning without you.
sentences.chinese: 不要折磨你自己即使你出來之後那筆交易還在贏錢。

sentences.english: Write on the paper with the digital inking pen.
Select a lip pencil that matches the natural color of your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 選用與你脣色一致的脣筆。

sentences.english: His starched white shirt has two pens in the breast pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他穿筆挺的白襯衫，胸袋有兩支筆。

sentences.english: Keep a notepad at your bedside along with a gentle night-light and pen.
sentences.chinese: 牀邊放一個小記事本，一盞柔和的夜明燈和一支筆。

sentences.english: The feather pen laughed at the inkstand.
The loan is on his account on Thursday. But the price is much higher than that on the previous day.
sentences.chinese: 那筆貸款週四到賬了，當天的股價又高出一大截。

sentences.english: Suppose someone gave you a pen – a sealed, solid-colored pen.
sentences.chinese: 如不美觀有人送你一支筆，一支不構怨卸的單色鋼筆。

sentences.english: Why don't you pick up which pencil which lay on the floor?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不把地板上的那枝自動筆拾起來呢？

sentences.english: That’s also why lip liner is a must in our later years, too.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼我們老年使用脣筆線。

sentences.english: Today, my boyfriend used a laser pointer to show me where I needed to lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我男友使用激光筆告訴我，我哪裏該減肥了。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate
